system.description: Phoenixes are not native to this plane.
system.appearance: A huge red-orange bird with feathers made of fire.

results.hit: Target is dead, ruined, and their SIZE is reduced by 1. If their SIZE was already less than 1, it is reduced to 0.

results.fail: Deal [[/roll 2d10[magic fire]]] damage to target.

system.heightened: For each additional MP spent, deal an additional [[/roll 2d10[magic fire]]] damage.

overview.base: You are immune to fire damage.
You are adept at magical flame abilities.
You fly at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead fly at full speed.

overview.base: You are immune to non-magic damage.
You gain Offensive Martial Arts and Defensive Martial Arts.

Your hands count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
You gain Supernatural Strength. In addition, you deal boosted with all melee weapon attacks and they are AV0 for you.
You gain Giant Strength and Shattering Grip. In addition, you may deboost any melee weapon attack to make it AV0.
You gain Improved Strength and Melee Damage Boost. In addition, you are no longer suffer the consequences of cumbersome items.
You gain Beastly Strength and Improved Armor Piercing.

Can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.
Note: AP weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be AV0.
Melee weapons you use are armor piercing.
You may spend an unused action to boost the triggering damage.
overview.proficient: You may spend an additional unused action to boost the triggering damage again.

system.trigger: You have hit a creature with a damaging melee weapon attack.

overview.base: Target is shattered.
You always have at least 3 AV. This is the case even when you are not wearing armor.

At the start of each of your turns, you warded revitalize and regain that many MP. This does not consume your mana die. If you were dead, this brings you back to life with the number of MP you rolled and 1 HP. You only die due to MP loss if you start your turn without successfully regenerating MP.

system.limitation: Can only revitalize MP spent on flame abilities .-

overview.base: You are immune to control effects as well as being frightened or charmed. The effects of Outsider Mind are maintained even if transformed.

At the start of each of your turns, you warded heal and regain that many HP. This does not consume your hit die. If you were dead, this brings you back to life with the number of HP you rolled and 1 MP. You only die due to HP loss if you start your turn without successfully regenerating HP.
You gain Bite and become fluent in it. Additionally, your mouth is AV0.

Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].
